channel.title: A new shield to replace the Dfs?
channel.description:
Hey, I think it'll be a drop from the new Qbd/Kq and its pretty obvious it'll happen as jagex are crashing the value of the Dfs to keep players happy but causing minimal damage as with the release of this new shield the dfs would have crashed like mad anyways.
I have a video which there is a part in the video where I explain the theory behind this but I decided not to post it as I'd not like to be viewed as a hoe for views like hash is lol.
But it is pretty self explanatory, thoughts?

item.title: A new shield to replace the Dfs?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:72, topic:428329”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=531020.msg3882553#msg3882553 date=1326156842]

No, he’s not the reason why they existed was to fulfil the desire to not play the game and to macro.

LIKE I SAID, HE MADE RSBOT.

I never knew he created the other bots that existed at that time too. THE REASONING BEHIND BOTS EXISTING ISN’T WHO MADE THEM.

Its like, why is there alcohol? Because consumers want it.
[/quote]

It’s like you’re ignoring the fact he made something worthwhile. What have you made?[/quote]
You don’t need to make something to contribute to society, then again you don’t understand simple concepts. I’ve raised over £10,000(if not more) for charity with of course the lovely people at Shelter and my sister. If you want to argue(as this is no longer a debate) pm me. Also, bots aren’t worthwhile. I’ve used them(if other people have this ability I’m not going to be one of the few without) but I would gladly remove the existence of them as they’ve ruined the game a fair part.

@elve, that is incorrect. It just means both are slaves to there emotions as they cannot control themselves. But yeah I get the point, I shouldn’t be arguing.

@rp4d Cba pming lol, fair enough.

Anyone got an issue with this post, pm me.

Read full topic

item.source: A new shield to replace the Dfs?

item.title: A new shield to replace the Dfs?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:70, topic:428329”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=531020.msg3882542#msg3882542 date=1326156053]

No, he’s not the reason why they existed was to fulfil the desire to not play the game and to macro.

LIKE I SAID, HE MADE RSBOT.
[/quote]
I never knew he created the other bots that existed at that time too. THE REASONING BEHIND BOTS EXISTING ISN’T WHO MADE THEM.

Its like, why is there alcohol? Because consumers want it.[/quote]I honestly don’t even see the point you’re trying to get across. The reason bots were in the game was because of two things.

  1. The desire to have an automaton do the work for you. This I know, and you did state it.

  2. Speljohan. If it weren’t for him, we likely would not have had the RSBot we knew, or possibly even the other bots. If it weren’t for him, there may not have been the chain reaction of other bots’ creations, or at least not for some time afterwards.

Let’s get back on topic now. If you really want to continue this discussion, then pm me.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:65, topic:428329”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=531020.msg3882205#msg3882205 date=1326130838]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=531020.msg3882065#msg3882065 date=1326113289]

Hey,
I think it’ll be a drop from the new Qbd/Kq and its pretty obvious it’ll happen as jagex are crashing the value of the Dfs to keep players happy but causing minimal damage as with the release of this new shield the dfs would have crashed like mad anyways.

I have a video which there is a part in the video where I explain the theory behind this but I decided not to post it as I’d not like to be viewed as a hoe for views like hash is lol.

But it is pretty self explanatory, thoughts?
[/quote]I HURD JAGEX EMPLOYS A COMMUNIST ECONOMY

go away

What is this s’post to mean? I suspect your not the brightest of people(I see that ‘Java Guru’ tag beside your name but it doesn’t mean your smart generally so don’t even bring it up) so just stfu oh wait your muted, this was a bit of pointless reply:).
[/quote]You do realize he is one of the main reasons bots ever existed right…?[/quote]
No, he’s not the reason why they existed was to fulfil the desire to not play the game and to macro.

And just because he is good at Java doesn’t mean he’s smart loool. Just shows at current times by our own standards he’s good at whatever was used to make the bot mostly consisting of Java… It doesn’t make him smart and clearly not wise. In these forums generally speaking there is a fairly decently sized knowledge base but again generally speaking most of the people who posses this knowledge lack basic common sense which is a shame.

item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

baddy351:

AFF, you are not a veteren. having an early join date means nothing. You posted a bit from august to december 2007, then came back in 2008 (for about 50 posts, and 3 days), then re joined in december 2011. In other words, you have not actually been here long. Don’t get too cocky. You act like you own mopar, and even more you bring up that you have ‘been’ here a long time, when you havn’t.

someone didn’t get the sarcasm too well

Cut out the arguing guys or it’s infraction time.

OT - No, they should stop creating more end game armor and start working on actual content goddamit

are intelligent (or lack thereof) debates disallowed on moparscape? not like there’s any flaming going on (yet).

mods are out to get me because they like to be pricks to new members (lol i joined 4.5 yrs ago and i’m new) - just like on EVERY community

dud look @ u scrub u got only 1 00 rep and ur WATCHED fuk1ng newf*G
[/quote]

im sry ok i wud have 104 rep but elve age derepped me 4 times ok[/quote]

AFF, you are not a veteren. having an early join date means nothing. You posted a bit from august to december 2007, then came back in 2008 (for about 50 posts, and 3 days), then re joined in december 2011. In other words, you have not actually been here long. Don’t get too cocky. You act like you own mopar, and even more you bring up that you have ‘been’ here a long time, when you havn’t.

item.source: A new shield to replace the Dfs?

item.title: A new shield to replace the Dfs?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:59, topic:428329”][quote author=Aff link=topic=531020.msg3881249#msg3881249 date=1326048434]

The only shield that they are planning to make that people know about is the dragon kiteshield, which will have stats proportional to the rest of the kiteshields of other metals, meaning an increase of only 5-10 to each defensive stat (aside from magic). I don’t see them making another shield to surpass the ones we have already, as they probably know by now that they need more middle-of-the-road content rather than end-game equipment as David stated. Sure, they might still add some, but I don’t see that happening for a while - at least until a new boss monster in the same tier as Corporeal Beast is released.

They claimed to have understood that they needed more middle-level equipment a while ago … then they released hybrid armor.
[/quote]Yes, but it only works in minigames thankfully.[/quote]They just keep making everything easier.

Read full topic

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:57, topic:428329”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=531020.msg3881235#msg3881235 date=1326047847]
The only shield that they are planning to make that people know about is the dragon kiteshield, which will have stats proportional to the rest of the kiteshields of other metals, meaning an increase of only 5-10 to each defensive stat (aside from magic). I don’t see them making another shield to surpass the ones we have already, as they probably know by now that they need more middle-of-the-road content rather than end-game equipment as David stated. Sure, they might still add some, but I don’t see that happening for a while - at least until a new boss monster in the same tier as Corporeal Beast is released.
[/quote]

They claimed to have understood that they needed more middle-level equipment a while ago … then they released hybrid armor.[/quote]Yes, but it only works in minigames thankfully.

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

They need a bigger variance in armours and weapons I think, generally speaking:/. Like add a lot of weapons/armours with varied stats not just getting stronger and stronger every update. Kindof like what other games do, there items have strong points but bad points.

item.source: A new shield to replace the Dfs?

item.title: A new shield to replace the Dfs?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

rip4d:

The only shield that they are planning to make that people know about is the dragon kiteshield, which will have stats proportional to the rest of the kiteshields of other metals, meaning an increase of only 5-10 to each defensive stat (aside from magic). I don’t see them making another shield to surpass the ones we have already, as they probably know by now that they need more middle-of-the-road content rather than end-game equipment as David stated. Sure, they might still add some, but I don’t see that happening for a while - at least until a new boss monster in the same tier as Corporeal Beast is released.

They claimed to have understood that they needed more middle-level equipment a while ago … then they released hybrid armor.

Read full topic
